verses.roman:
śivānandera bālake śloka karāilā
siṁha-dvāre dvārī prabhure kṛṣṇa dekhāilā

synonyms: śivānandera—of Śivānanda Sena; bālake—the son; śloka karāilā—made to compose a verse; siṁha-dvāre—at the Siṁha-dvāra gate of the Jagannātha temple; dvārī—the doorkeeper; prabhure—unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛṣṇa dekhāilā—showed Lord Kṛṣṇa.
translation: It also describes how Śivānanda's son composed a verse and how the doorkeeper of the Siṁha-dvāra showed Kṛṣṇa to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
